coreAttributes.name: katana
coreAttributes.description: A sword of Japanese origin, with a curved, slender, single-edged arcane blade. It has a circular guard, called a 'tsuba', and long grip so that it may be wielded with two hands. It is traditionally paired with the smaller wakizashi, or 'side sword'.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] katana at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] katana at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] katana, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] katana, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] katana, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] katana, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
